explains: v. 签字；写下；示意（sign 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: signing ceremony 签字仪式；签约仪式
signing off 船员解雇签署；声明离开

sentences.en: I won't be bullied into signing anything.
sentences.cn: 我绝不会屈服于压力签署任何东西。

sentences.en: She's hesitant about signing the contract.
sentences.cn: 她对是否签这个合同还犹豫不决。

sentences.en: She didn't understand the form she was signing.
sentences.cn: 她弄不懂她正在签署的表格。
